23679,tw_games/coin_collector,"this is the present state of the game

Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, attempt to go south. Following that, go west. Once you do that, go north. Following that, make an attempt to travel east. Then, try to go to the north. And then, pick up the coin from the floor of the studio. That's it!
-= Vault =-
You arrive in a vault. An usual one. You begin to take stock of what's here.
You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.
these are the possible verbs you can use: ['drop', 'examine', 'go', 'inventory', 'look', 'take'].
